function.arguments: {"return_type": "give_answer", "final_answer": "Manchester United Football Club, commonly referred to as Man United, was founded on April 24, 1902. The club is based in Manchester, England, and plays its home games at Old Trafford, which has a total capacity of 74,879 seats. The club's full address is Sir Matt Busby Way, Manchester, M16 0RA, and their contact phone number is +44 1616767770. The club's official website is www.manutd.com. Manchester United has a squad size of 27 players with an average age of 26.73 years, including 19 international players. Notable players in the squad include Cristiano Ronaldo, who plays as a Centre-Forward and was born on February 5, 1985."}
